line.en: The answer sheets are collected as soon as the\nbell rings.
The thread of tension finally snaps and the\nclassroom begins to buzz.
Today is the middle day of the exam period.
The exams are almost over and summer break is\ncoming.
'How was it, Aoi?'
'So-so.'
I filled out the answer sheet although I crammed\nthe night before.
'I am considered a bad boy, so I should try to\nkeep my grades up.'
'Right. What are you going to do?'
She means she wants to go home together if I\ndon't have any plans.
'Sorry. I should stay and study.'
'Ok.'
Ageha sounded she like she didn't care. Then she\ngave me a vicious smile.
'Good luck!'
There must have been some meaning in her smile\nthat was lost on me. Ageha ran to Kotori.
'What was that...?'
'Does she know...?'
...That I love Amane.
When they were having their girl talk upstairs\nthe other day, they seemed a little strange.
'But I don't act like I love her...'
I don't show them how I feel.
If they can tell, they must be psychic.
But thinking that, I stop walking towards the\ngarage.
'...She might have noticed.'
Not Ageha, but Amane.
She turned me down once. So if I go see her for\nno reason, she would realize.
'...I shouldn't go today.'
'...I came here again.'
To the garage.
It's going to be fine. She is oblivious, so she\nwon't figure it out.
And I came up with a reason to come here.
'Hey.'
Amane was working on the computer in the garage\nwith the shutter half-open.
She looks serious as usual.
She doesn't hear me as usual. I pay no mind to it\nand open my bag.
What I got out from my bag is a lunch box.
'Amane, please have this if you want.'
This is my excuse to come here.
I brought an extra lunch box.
I put it on her desk.
She still doesn't notice me.
When I look at her face carefully, it is red like\nshe has a fever.
She is staring at the screen and sometimes,
'What!? Oh... Um...'
She says.
She is even more confused than usual.
'(What is confusing her like this?)'
Curious, I looked over her shoulders to the\nscreen from behind.
On the screen, I see the image of something I\nseem to have seen before. It was something big.
The closest thing I've seen to this would be,
The P.E. textbook.
'The P-penis...goes in...the vagina...'
The image she was fixated on, was a diagram of a\nmale and female genitals!
'(W-...what should I do!!?)'
What is this situation!
Why is she looking at something like that???
Wait no, she is free to look at whatever she\nwants, I know, but... What am I supposed to say\nhaving witnessed all this?
*clattering*
As soon as she saw me, her face turned red and\nshe jumped up.
Then she tried to hide the screen.
'I-i-i-it's not what it looks like.'
'I was just... studying. I mean...uhh...'
'...I'm sorry.'
I look away and apologize.
'...I didn't see anything. Ok bye.'
'Wait!'
*grab*
She grabbed my arm as I was trying to leave.
'...please wait. If you go home like that, I feel\nlike we're going to be left with an unmendable\nand awkward situation!'
'Please let me explain...'
She looks serious as usual.
'Go ahead.'
'...Everyone says... I don't know anything about\ndating.'
'Right.'
'So I managed to get a specialist in this field\n(aka Kanako) to give me some advice, and she gave\nme some sites.'
'So this is that site...?'
The screen was still showing the images of\ngenitals.
She quickly leaned over the PC, reached for the\npower cord and pulled it out
That was the first time I've seen Amane move that\nquickly before. She can move fast if she actually\ntries!
Pzzzt...as the computer forcefully powered down.
'...is it okay to switch it off like that?'
It's a brand new PC as well.
'I made the judgement that right now the thing I\nmust protect is not the PC.'
'But, why did you go from talking about dating to\nvisiting a sex-education site?'
'That was one of the sites that Kanako told me to\ngo to...but...it's, s...s-...'
'You don't have to voice everything until the\nend.'
'...but apparently the knowledge involved with\nit,'
'i-is much more important than I had thought.'
That might be true.
'I understand. Then I will forget what I saw just\nnow.'
'Please don't worry about it, and continue your\nstudies.'
'Ah, also, this is your lunch box...please eat it\nwhen you get hungry.'
I pointed at the lunch box I left on the table.
Amane deeply flushed lowered her head.
It was the first time I've seen Amane with an\nembarassed face.
'(So even she gets embarassed...)'
It's so new.
Although I should get going or else it may get\ntoo awkward, but then Amane asked.
'Hey, Aoi...'
'What?'
'Have you done it before...?'
'Huh?'
'I-I'm saying...se-...x.'
Fidgets.
She asked with a cute and shy-looking upward\nglance.
'N-No! Of course I haven't!!'
I replied in a ruffled manner, and Amane was a\nbit taken aback.
'Really? ...I thought you must have.'
'To be honest, I haven't either.'

'The high school girls who come in and out of
here for their part time work says, it's
extremely rare for me to be like this, and they
think I am a living fossil.'
'A living fossil is like a coelacanth. But I\nstill haven't figured out something that I could\nhave in common.'
'We live on the same earth, but the coelacanth is\na fish,' she whispered to herself seriously.
As I looked at her, I thought of something.
'(So senpai hasn't done it yet...)'
I had assumed that in this one year, that kind of\nthing had most likely already happened.
Because Amane is a pretty person.
Just like a deep sea coalecanth, when she takes a\nstep out of the garage she spends all her time\nin, a huge crowd of guys would gather about her.
'(So me saying "Of course I haven't" is actually\nstrange?)'
Though I said that reflexively, it would not be\nstrange if I had had that kind of an experience\nbefore.
But I've had no luck with girls.
'(Even though I live a lifestyle surrounded by\ngirls)'
In the end, I still like Amane and I haven't even\nregarded the other girls around me as potential\npartners.
'...is that right, so Aoi hasn't either.'
As I thought to myself, Amane was thinking about\nsomething and talking to herself again.
I recalled that we have had this kind of\nconversation before at one time...I think.
It was if I recall correctly, last year's summer,\nthat night when we were waiting for a morning\nglory.
Me and Amane went to the runway on our own.
'Then, have you kissed someone before...?'
'N-no I haven't.'
'...is that right. Here I thought you must have\ndone it already.'
'If I had the chance, I would like to.'
'Mm.'
'Then want to try it with me?'
At that time I couldn't accept her proposal which\nmade her angry then she left.
The conversation we had just now is very\nsimilar...
In fact, it's the same!
I thought.
'T-then, want to...'
Amane nervously glanced upwards at me, trying to\nstart a sentence.
It seems she's about to say something\npreposterous.
'Want, to have s...'
'...if you say anymore than that I'm seriously\ngoing to get angry.'
'Ah.'
Amane froze mid-sentence.
'W-why is that? I'm just saying I was wondering\nif you want to have s-...'
'I'm going to get angry.'
Slide.
I took one step towards her.
'Auuau...Aoi has a scary face~~'
Amane cried with a tearful face.
I let out a huge sigh, then in one stride I faced\naway.
'When you're doing those kinds of studies, please\ndo it where no one else can see.'
I said as I left the garage.
'...shun.'
'...geez, even while knowing my feelings.'
Unknowingly, I muttered in complaint.
Then want to have...
Well of course I would want to do that too!
But not for the reason of, 'We both want to do it\nso there is no harm'.
And that's all the more true if the person is the\none I really like.
'...perhaps because I think this way that, I\nhaven't experienced it up until now.'
I hear that young people nowadays are much more\ncasual about sex.
But I am like this so there's nothing I can do.
'...is Amane the same? Would she just do it with\nsomeone for that kind of reason...?'
Peering up at the constantly (annoyingly) clear\nsky, I got a little depressed.
Final exams are over, now for the long-awaited\nsummer vacation.
'Be careful on your way home.'
I said farewell to Yuuka as she leaves the dorm\nto head home.
Sanae and Ryouko had gone home already yesterday.
Of the residents who are going home to spend\nsummer vacation, Yuuka was the last one.
With only half the usual residents left at Flying\nFish Manor, it's not as lively as usual.
Incidentally, Kotori isn't returning home either.

Hibari tried to convince her, but given that
Amane had just got back and we've just taken back
the garage, there is no way she could afford to
leave Kazegaura.
Asa and Yoru originally lived a walkable distance\nfrom Flying Fish Manor so they decided to just\nstay here.
'The only other one left was Kanako.'
Just like last year, she said she's not going\nhome.
Although there are still residents, for the time\nbeing I am free from my dorm master duties.
At last I can focus on my club activities!
'Asa, the materials are almost here, can you make\na space for it?'
'Okay!'
'Kotori, use this time to revise the work\nschedule. And also pass me the blueprint.'
'Sure thing.'
Ageha casually gave out some orders.
The others all followed the orders and got busy.
At last we begin our work --- the remodelling of\nour glider!
'I'm excited.'
'More than just excited, I want to start doing\nstuff now!'
It's been a year since we've been downgraded to\nan associate group, so this has been a\nlong-awaited event.
Despite having tired ourselves out from exams, we\nwere able to withstand the summer rays and work\nin high spirit.
'Ageha, you here?'
'An-chan!'
An-chan peered in through an opening in the\nshutter.
'Help me carry the materials.'
'Coming! Aoi, Asa, Yoru.'
'Yeah!'
'Let's go Yoru.'
'Yes.'
From the roof rack of the light-truck that\nAn-chan drove in from the back gate, we removed a\nlarge amount of items.
Huge cardboard boxes, tin plate cans, and various\nother stuff.
These were all materials to be used for\nre-engineering the glider.
Last year we used Amane's pocket money to buy our\nmaterials, but this time it was different.
During the one year we were downgraded to an\nassociate group, Ageha and Kotori had taken up\npart time jobs at An-chan's workplace.
They learnt various engineering techniques, and\neven got a significant amount of pay for their\nwork.
That pay wasn't in cash. It was in materials.
Judging from the blueprint that Amane had worked\non, we estimated the amount of needed material\nfor the remodelling and received all we needed.
And because the place where they work gets their\nstock for cheap, they even let us choose the best\nparts.
And right now we are carrying these in.
'Can of resin, place it here where it's cool. Box\nof glass cloths over here. The others are...'
Kotori directed us as we arranged the large\namounts of materials and soon there were\nmountains of it piled up.
Kotori and Ageha surveyed their booty and looked\nabout proudly.
It's the results of their hard work, their fruits\nnow gaining physical shape. It's only obvious\nthat they would be proud.
'...huh? It looks like there are too many\npolyester resin tins.'
'You're right. Heey An-chaaan!'
'Ah that. Yes, that's my parting gift for you.\nBecause you guys are estimating for just enough\nmaterials, right?'
'If you don't have enough that would cause\nproblems, plus, if there's left overs you can use\nit for maintenance, right?'
'Thank you An-chan!'
'Thank you very much!'
'It's nothing. It's for my precious juniors, and\nI really wanted to do something for you guys.'
An-chan said casually. Even if he does this,\nwe're already more than indebted to him.
'Oooh...'
Amane looked at the piles of material and looked\nrather impressed.
'Amane, we're going to make it at last. Amane's\ndesign for the new glider!'
'You're not happy?'
'No I'm happy but...it's a mysterious feeling.'
'When I was drawing the designs, I had in mind\nthat I was going to build it as well.'
'Mmm...Amane is weird.'
'Everything has been brought in!'
'Thank you. An-chan thanks to you too.'
'I'm looking forward to you guys flying this\nglider.'
An-chan ruffled Ageha's hair a little.
And then An-chan looked towards Amane and then\nleft the garage without saying anything else.
'Alright peoples. We're doing this!!'
At Kotori's command, we began our work on\nremodelling the plane.
Our work proceeded.
Before the exams, we spent our time repairing the\nparts that had been damaged.
During that time, we had taught Asa and the\nothers on the basics of FRP processing.
For this job, our primary concern was on\nimproving the main wings.

Right now it was just an orthodox taper wing, but
we will turn them into forward drive wings which
means the way it gets mounted to the body has to
be shifted back a little.
If we did that, the center of gravity will hang\nfurther backwards, and the overall balance of the\nplane will be better.

Among the jobs, the remodelling of the main wings
is the most time consuming work. It's the same
stuff as what we did last year, and with the
experience, Ageha and the others are now rather
skilled.
Rather it was the remodelling of the body that is\nthe hardest part.
If we fail, it's possible that the body becomes\ncompletely wasted.
That is why when An-chan has time, we're going to\nget him to come in and take a look.
The rest is simply creating small detailed parts.
'We don't have the resources to fail too many\ntimes. Let's do this carefully.'
'Yes. Just like the one that Amane made, if it\nbreaks off in the middle of flight we would be in\nbig trouble.'
'That's weird...I remember I made it\nperfectly...'
Amane listening in on Kotori's conversation,\npouted her face at the computer.
'Amane what are you doing?'
'Is it work?'
Amane has been bringing her stuff from work to do\nthem in the garage.
Thanks to that, she can stay here all afternoon.
For some reason hesitating on her words, she\nglanced this way.
'Ah, this is a simulator.'
'Huh? but the silhouette to this plane is...'
'To capacitate the remodelled plane, we had\nimproved the code to the simulator...with this\nyou can do a bit more training.'
'Aoi! It's amazing, come here quick!'
'Wow, you're right...the shape of the plane is\ndifferent.'
The plane from the blueprints which I have seen\nnumerous times was being rendered in coloured 3D\nCG on screen.
'Can you already fly this?'
Amane who was aware of my presence, nodded.
Ever since that day when I saw Amane looking at a\nsex education site, it's been awkward between the\ntwo of us.
'Wow this is already in working order!'
'Yeah, with this I can do some practice before\nour test flight.'
That would be a tremendous help to me.
With the changes to the shape of the wings, the\nbehaviour of the flight should be different.
Regardless of how much training you have\nundergone, when it comes to actually flying a\nplane, it's still scary.
I thought when,
'(Yes! I made Aoi happy~ô)'
Amane made two small fists and smiled.
'...what happened all of a sudden. Amane with\nthat smile...it's a bit creepy.'
'Auu...it's nothing.'
'Okay Aoi, do the simulation. We'll call for you\nwhen we need you.'
'Sure, I got it.'
And so we continued our work until the sun was\nsetting.
We wanted to reach a point where we would be\nready to do test flights as soon as possible.
While the others were busy labouring in the\ngarage, I sat in a corner and tested the new\nsimulator with Amane.
'(The feeling is a bit different. Probably\nbecause of the shifted weight...?)'
I recalled the flights from summer of last year,\ntrying to compare the feeling of the flight from\nbefore the remodelling.
As I did that...
*glance*
I took a quick look at Amane who was nearby.
She's still facing the PC and doing her own job\nit seems.
Amane's profile staring into her screen to me\nlooked dignified, and beautiful.
'(Oops...better concentrate)'
Ever since that time we've been awkward around\neach other.
I've been trying not to be too conscious of it\nbut Amane has clearly been avoiding me...in fact\nshe's very nervous around me.
'(That time perhaps it was my mistake for getting\nso angry.)'
But there was good reason to be angry.
Even knowing my feelings, she went ahead and said\nthose kinds of things.
That's not forgiveable even for a natural\nairhead.
'(...although it was sort of a shame as well.)'
Glance.
Again I looked over to Amane.
Right there was the person I admired the most.
If I was able to have my first time with her...
'(The fact that I am still worrying over it\nmeans, I haven't fully settled things regarding\nher inside of me.)'
And I said to Kotori that I was happy just being\nable to tell her my feelings, and made a show of\nit.
I sighed on my own.
'(Aoi was looking straight at Amane and he just\nsighed...!)'
'...Amane, Amane.'
'? What is it Kotori?'
'Come here for a second.'
'Is there a problem?'
'Hey, how have you been with Aoi ever since\nthen?'
'Somehow you two seem to be even worse than\nbefore...?'
'Hadn't he told you? About how he likes you?'
'Geez, then what are you doing!'
'But...it's embarassing.'
'Aoi thinks that too. When he had to confess to\nyou.'
'Have more courage! If you tell him you like him\ntoo, he's definitely going to say okay!'
'...I wonder?'
'I'm serious! I'll guarantee it!'
'But it's been a whole year, wouldn't he think\n"why now"...?'
'...why do you think like a normal girl for just\nthis one part??'
'To begin with, you guys hadn't met in a year,\nwhy did you assume you were going out? Don't you\nthink it was weird??'
'...I did think it was a bit weird, I guess. It\nwas weird...but I'm a dummy so...'
'Try to find an opportunity and then start a\nconversation with him.'
'Uuu...I'm too conscious of it, I don't think I\ncan talk well...'
'That's still fine, you are normally weird anyway\nso I'm sure Aoi would treat you properly.'
'...I'm that weird?'
'Yes you're weird. So have some confidence!'
'Oo, yeah...!'
Amane and Kotori had a chat about something in\nanother part of the garage before returning to\nher seat.
She was a bit flushed.
And she's glancing over here time and time again.
'(What did they just talk about?)'
They didn't come to me, so I wonder what they\nsecretly spoke about just now?
'H-hey, Aoi.'
Amane walked over and stared into the simulation\nscreen.
'...h-how is it, this thing?'
'Yes, it's really well built.'
'Really?'
'If I just train with this, even during the real\nflight I can control it without feeling\nbewildered by the controls.'
'Thank you very much, Amane.'
'Noo, ahaha. I got praised by Aoi~ô'
She then happily got back to her seat, returning\nto a great mood.
Getting praised for work on the simulator was\napparently a really happy thing for her.
'(What a weird person.)'
Although she's always been a weird person.
'(Hey Amane! What are you doing getting back to\nyour seat! There was such a good mood there!!)'
'(T-that's right! I forgot!)'
'Ah, Aoi.'
Senpai came back to me.
'Yes?'
'Umm...a-are you hungry?'
'Well a bit, yes.'
When I saw the clock, it was already 7.
We were so focused on our jobs we had completely\nforgotten the time.
'I'll, go buy something.'
'Eh? No that's not...'
'Heey, I'm going to go get dinner for us from the\nconvenience store. Tell me what you want-!'
I called out to the others as they replied with\ntheir requests.
Kotori for some reason looked extremely\nirritated. Perhaps she doesn't like convenience\nstore food?
'Amane, what do you want?'
'Rice ball and sandwich and, ultra miso-pork\nramen...thanks.'
'Got it. Okay I'll be back.'
I left the garage and ran off to the convenience\nstore.
Soon enough, it was completely dark.
We had dinner and it's now a few hours later.
Because it's the first day, everyone is working\nwith high spirits.
I too continued with the simulator training while\nhelping out here and there.
'Let's leave it at that for today.'
Ageha said after having made good progress.
We started packing up.
'Asa, Yoru, was it a little hard?'
'No, not at all. It was very interesting.'
'Yes, me too. I would like to see it finished\nsoon and watch the final flying product.'
'I'd want to see it too.'
'Is what they said, Kotori club leader.'
'Nothing short of being members of our soaring\nclub!'
I too prepared to shut down the PC and get ready\nto leave.
'Amane.'
'Thank you very much for the improvements to the\nsimulator.'
'It's been extremely helpful.'
'Ah, that...'
Amane for some reason blushed and averted my\ngaze.
'Amane what are you going to do? We are headed\nhome now.'
'I've still got some work.'
'Please be careful on your way back.'
'Yes...thanks.'
For some reason she said shyly.
Pinch.
She held onto my fingers.
'Auau...good night, Aoi.'
Then she let me go again, and sped off as if to\nrun away from me.
'Good night...'
'I really like her--------------!!!!'
Rolling around and around and around!
As soon as I got back to my room, I hugged my\npillow and started rolling around.
That mysterious thing she did when I was about to\nleave...*slight grab*
'Dammmmmm----- What the hell was that?'
And doing so, her shy, red face looking into\nmine.
Why did she look at me like that?
She is much older and she looks mature, but how\nshe acts and her facial expressions... it's cute,\nlike a child.
Amane is cute!!
And yet she's older!!
Since I met her again, I've tried not to show my\nfeelings.
But after that day...
T-then, want to...
I can't control my feelings.
There is no way to calm myself down other than\nrolling around in bed.
*rolling rolling*
*rolling rolling rolling*
I'm rolling around in the small bed.
'*pant pant*'
I feel stupid because I got confused. But I'm\ncalm now.
I settle down and start thinking about what I\nshould do.
'I should try to tell her how I feel again.'
At that time, I thought she was going to be gone.\nThat's why I told her.
It was like I was going to die in battle... I\nmean, I just wanted her to know before it was too\nlate.
But this time it's different.
If I get to spend time with her again, this\ntime...
'...I have to tell her how I feel.'
If I don't, I'll end up hugging my pillow and\nrolling around in bed like an idiot everyday.
I swear, remembering her hand that touched my\nfinger.
There are so few chances to ask her out.
First, we have to be alone.
Just asking her out is not good enough either.\nThe atmosphere is important.
If I take her out to the garage where everybody\nworks, people will notice. There is no chance\nthat'll work.
I played around with the simulator and helped\nthem work.
'*yawn*'
I try not to yawn.
'(This is no good. I'm not sleeping enough.)'
I've had a lack of sleep lately.

During exams, I studied late into the evening.
After summer break started, I've been waking up
early to repair the dormitory which was damaged
by a storm. The list goes on.
What's more, I have been thinking about Amane. So\nI've barely been able to sleep.
It's very hard to work in the club in this\ncondition.
Kotori is glaring at me.
'(...What did I do to make her mad?)'
Is she mad because I broke her egg yolk this\nmorning?
While working, I pretend not to notice.
'...Aoi, do you have a minute?'
Kotori took me outside of the garage.
'Why do we have to be outside?'
If she wants to complain about her egg yolk, this\nis a little excessive.
Kotori checks to make sure that nobody is around,\nthen she turns to me.
'Hey...how have you and Amane been doing since\nthen?'
'How? Nothing's changed.'
I said it nonchalantly.
It's called a poker face.
'(I'm asking because you don't look the same.)'
'(Everybody already knows you care about Amane.)'
'(But you are still pretending like nobody knows.\nIt's frustrating!)'
'What are you saying to yourself?'
'*cough* 'You still love her, don't you?'
'...yea. Something like that'
'By the way, you told Ageha about it, didn't\nyou?'
'What? Why?'
'Because everybody looks at me funny. They look\nat me and smile as if they are thinking about\nsomething.'
'N, no, I didn't say anything.'
'Then who did?'
'Nobody. It's just obvious.'
She looks confused and murmurs.
'Whatever. Hey, what did you want?'
'Oh yeah. You are like that and Amane is a\nchicken. I can't watch you guys.'
'So I'll just say it. Amane...'
'Hey Kotori! What are you doing over there?'
Ageha appered suddenly and cut off out\nconversation.
'I'm not playing... aww...'
'You have something to do, don't you, Aoi?'
'Oh, sorry.'
I apologize and look at Kotori.
'...Nothing. Sorry.'
She said it sadly.
I left them behind and went back to garage.
'...So what are you guys talking about?'
'...I was going to say that Amane loves him.'
'I know it's hard to watch them but it's none of\nyour business.'
'They have to say it themselves.'
'I know. But... I, well...'
'What?'
'(Uuu... I can't say it... the fact that Aoi told\nme secretly about how he feels, I can't say it to\nAgeha---!!.'
'? What are you anguishing over?'
'Nothing...'
'...you know, I always thought Kotori had liked\nAoi.'
'What? What made you think that!!'
'That was the feeling I get from you. But instead\nyou are trying to help Amane.'
'Well yes I like him but... as a friend...and\nbecause he is my friend I want to help him.'
'...And I like Amane, too. Don't you like her?'
'Yes.'
'That's why I can't watch them.'
'If Amane and Aoi get together, it'll make me\nhappy. It'll be awesome.'
'Yes. It's a little sad though.'
'...Yes, it is.'
'Ok. Let's go back and get to work.'
'Alright.'
'Okay. That's all for today!'
'Everybody did a great job.'
'Good job. We are doing really well.'
'We are following the plan. If we work a little\nharder, we might be able to cut some of the\nbuilding time.'
'It's because of Asa and Yoru.'
'Ehehehe'
'Let's clean up and go home.'
'Zzzz...'
'Aoi fell asleep.'
'Oh, yeah.'
'He's been working in the dormitory, too. It\nlooks like hard work.'
'Aoi, wake up! Aoi.'
'Zzzz...'
'He's not waking up...'
'Maybe we can just let him sleep like this.'
'But he can't go home.'
'That's the point. Tee hee.'
'I got it! Amane, Amane.'
'What?'
'We'll leave Aoi here. So please take care of\nhim.'
'What? Oh, okay.'
'See you then.'
'See you.'
'See ya.'
'*looks around*'
'(Gulp)'
'Ughhh...'
'...are you awake?'
'...He just rolled over. Is he comfortable?'
